OOC: Sorry, I forgot to put my other chars in that last post
::Composer/Sym=
phony/Bodicons/Skullgrin/Triggerhappy::

     Composer looked at Wheeljack.=


     "Once the Lavacons get here, we'll be done in no time.  I really thi=
nk that if we work together, we can make the Alliance the most powerful fac=
tion on this rock!" Composer said with enthusiasm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Symphony woke up, lifting his head off of the c=
ontrol room board.

       "Ugh, I must've fell asleep.  I'm bored.  I'm go=
ing to explore the land, see what I can find," He said, walking tiredly out=
side.

        Symphony walked through a forest.  He was quite a ways from =
the CF now.  He still felt a little tired, so he sat against a tree trunk, =
and laid his little music playing device beside him.  Listening to music he=
lped him greatly to feel relaxed, and get some shut-eye.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Decapitron was now slowing down, as he wa=
s under Condor.  He rolled down the window on Legtrap's side.

        "Leg=
trap, see if you can trap that Maximal!!!" He commanded.

         Legtrap =
nodded.  He sort of stood, half his body out the window.  Then, he got out =
a special gun.  He fired a big energon net up at Condor, in attemp to bring=
 the bird Maximal down.  Meanwhile, Headshot sat comfortably, awaiting orde=
rs from Decapitron before doing anything.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~
        Gutclaw picked up the Decepticon distress signal.

     =
   "Explobody, let's go towards that signal!  If it's some Decepticons, we =
welcome them, if it's a trap, we slag any bots there," He yelle up to Explo=
body.

        Explobody nodded, as well as a mechanical bird can, and then=
 flew off towards the signal.  Gutclaw followed, running fast in mechanical=
 leopard mode, looking back to see if any of the other Decepticons were com=
ing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Skullgrin recieved=
 the Decepticon distress signal as well.  He went off towards it.
~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Triggerhappy picked up the distr=
ess signal from Africa.  He backed off from Angel Prime, and landed then tr=
ansformed to robot mode, with Blowpipe in his hand.  He opened his com to C=
yclonus.

         "Cyclonus, are you getting that distress signal?  Skullg=
rin and the two newbies(Bodicons)look like they are going after it.  What s=
hould we do?" He asked.
